description: A high-risk profile for testing the cervical cancer risk prediction bot. This profile includes multiple risk factors that should result in a high risk prediction (60-90% probability).

how_to_test.method_1: Use the /predict endpoint with this JSON body
how_to_test.method_2: Use the frontend UI and enter these values

notes: This profile should trigger a HIGH risk prediction. If the model predicts low risk (<33%), the model needs to be retrained with the improved training script.
